div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 661 Lunca, near Bazias, 65 km. SW of (628) Resita, Rumania, c. 1912 Burial: after 54 B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 52 AR Apollonia, Illyria: 3 dr. Dyrrhachium: 10 dr. Imit. Philip II: 1 tetradr. Roman Rep.: 38 den. Disposition: dispersed Harsanyi, NK 1912, p. 141
